key.name: overlay-background-type
key.description: Type of background: solid, gradient-vertical, gradient-horizontal, gradient-radial

key.name: overlay-background-color
key.description: RGBA color for the overlay background (or gradient start color)

key.name: overlay-background-color-end
key.description: RGBA end color for gradient backgrounds

key.name: overlay-grid-color
key.description: RGBA color for layout grid borders

key.name: layout-card-background
key.description: Background color for layout preview cards

key.name: layout-card-border
key.description: Border color for layout preview cards

key.name: zone-background
key.description: Background color for zones in layout previews

key.name: zone-border
key.description: Border color for zones in layout previews

key.name: overlay-highlight-color
key.description: RGBA color for zone highlight on hover

key.name: zone-too-small-color
key.description: RGBA color for zones that are too small to contain windows

key.name: zone-min-width
key.description: Minimum width in pixels for a zone to be considered usable

key.name: zone-min-height
key.description: Minimum height in pixels for a zone to be considered usable

key.name: overlay-opacity
key.description: Overall opacity of the overlay (0.0 - 1.0)

key.name: hitbox-background-color
key.description: RGBA color for the trigger/hitbox indicator when closed

key.name: trigger-zone-height
key.description: Height in pixels of the edge trigger zone

key.name: overlay-strip-size
key.description: Height/width in pixels of the overlay strip when open

key.name: overlay-scale
key.description: Scale factor for overlay size (0.5-2.0)

key.name: layout-spacing
key.description: Spacing in pixels between layout cards

key.name: trigger-edge
key.description: Which screen edge triggers the overlay: top, left, right, or bottom

key.name: monitor-mode
key.description: Which monitor(s) to show overlay on: primary, all, or current

key.name: auto-hide-enabled
key.description: Automatically hide overlay when mouse leaves

key.name: push-time
key.description: Time in milliseconds to hover in trigger zone before opening overlay

key.name: animation-duration
key.description: Duration of fade animations in milliseconds

key.name: disable-native-edge-tiling
key.description: Disable GNOME's built-in edge tiling feature to prevent conflicts

key.name: debug-mode
key.description: Enable verbose logging for troubleshooting

key.name: show-layout-names
key.description: Show layout names above tile previews

key.name: snap-mode-timeout
key.description: Seconds before automatically exiting SNAP MODE (10-300)

key.name: max-window-thumbnails
key.description: Maximum number of windows to show in SNAP MODE selector (4-20)

key.name: snap-thumbnail-width
key.description: Width of each window thumbnail in SNAP MODE selector (200-600px)

key.name: snap-thumbnail-height
key.description: Height of each window thumbnail in SNAP MODE selector (180-500px)

key.name: snap-thumbnail-padding
key.description: Padding inside each window thumbnail card in SNAP MODE selector (0-64px)

key.name: show-window-labels
key.summary: Show window labels in SNAP MODE
key.description: Show a single-line window/app label under thumbnails in SNAP MODE selector

key.name: motion-throttle-interval
key.description: Minimum milliseconds between motion event processing (lower = more responsive, higher = better performance)

key.name: enabled-layouts
key.description: Array of layout IDs to display

key.name: custom-layouts
key.description: JSON array of custom layout definitions

key.name: snap-preview-enabled
key.description: Show snap grid overlay when dragging windows

key.name: snap-preview-layout
key.description: Layout to use for snap preview grid

key.name: snap-preview-auto-snap
key.description: Automatically snap window when released over a zone

key.name: snap-preview-grid-color
key.description: Color of snap zones in the preview grid

key.name: snap-preview-grid-border-color
key.description: Color of zone borders in the preview grid

key.name: snap-preview-highlight-color
key.description: Color of highlighted zone when window is over it

key.name: snap-preview-opacity
key.description: Opacity of the snap preview grid overlay (0.1 - 1.0)

key.name: snap-disable-key
key.description: Press this key while dragging to disable snap preview, or during SNAP MODE to exit

key.name: zone-split-enabled
key.description: Allow dropping on edges of zones to snap to half the zone

key.name: zone-split-threshold
key.description: How far from zone edge to trigger split (0.15-0.45, as fraction of zone size)

key.name: zone-split-preview-color
key.description: Color of the split preview indicator

key.name: shake-to-dismiss-enabled
key.description: Shake mouse left-right quickly to dismiss snap preview during drag

key.name: shake-threshold
key.description: Number of direction changes needed to trigger dismiss (2-6)

key.name: shake-time-window
key.description: Milliseconds within which direction changes must occur (200-1000)

key.name: shake-min-movement
key.description: Minimum pixels of movement to count as a shake direction (10-100)

key.name: monitor-layouts
key.description: JSON object mapping monitor index to layout ID, persisted between sessions
